carouselCards.title: The Tech Enthusiast
carouselCards.description: I'm a dedicated developer based in Uganda, passionate about building digital solutions that make a real difference in how businesses operate.

carouselCards.title: Makerere University
carouselCards.description: Graduated with a focus on Business Computing and Computer Software Engineering, laying the foundation for my career in technology.

carouselCards.title: Sumic IT Solutions
carouselCards.description: Currently working as a Business Computing Intern, developing robust systems like payroll and water billing management.

carouselCards.title: Future Focus
carouselCards.description: My goal is to continue building software that simplifies complex tasks and empowers users through intuitive and efficient design.
